author: luehe
msg: Fixed 15937: Misleading error message produced if jsp:body is not a
child of a standard or custom action.

author: costin
msg: Remove the dependency of jasper on xerces.
The "default" if xerces is not detected is to return UTF8 for encoding.
This is probably not the best answer - the code should at least parse
the file or try to do a simpler version of what xerces is doing, but
Now at least it works without xerces.
The detection should be probably a commons package.

author: luehe
msg: Applied patch provided by Dimitry Ivanov to fix synchronization of
AT_BEGIN and NESTED variables for tag handlers implementing BodyTag
